text: Rohini Godbole (12 November 1952 â€“ 25 October 2024) was an Indian physicist and academic. Her works focused in elementary particle physics: field theory and phenomenology. She was professor at the Indian Institute of Science in Bangalore. She was born in Pune, India. Godbole died on 25 October 2024 at her home in Bangalore from a short-illness at the age of 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * Autobiographical article by Rohini Godbole in Lilavati's Daughters Category:1952 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Indian physicists Category:Indian academics Category:People from Pune
title: Rohini Godbole
